meanings.sent1: The spectatorial crowd cheered loudly at the exciting game.
meanings.sent2: The movie had a spectatorial audience that enjoyed the film.
meanings.sent3: The spectatorial fans couldn't contain their excitement during the concert.
meanings.sent4: Her spectatorial gaze took in every detail of the art exhibit.
meanings.sent5: The spectatorial experience of the play left a lasting impression on the viewers.

meanings.sent4: The detective's spectatorial eye caught the subtle clue in the crime scene.
meanings.sent5: The spectatorial attention to detail was crucial in solving the mystery.
